method.name: Send(string, string, params Attachment[])
method.summary: Sends the mail synchronously without a title.
method.param: message in plain text or html.

method.name: Send(string, string, string, params Attachment[])
method.summary: Sends the mail synchronously with a title.
method.param: message in plain text or html.

method.name: Send(string, string, string, string, params Attachment[])
method.summary: Sends the mail synchronously with a title and optionally with display name.
method.param: message in plain text or html.

[can be null] sender's name, for example: "Microsoft Corp.".
Note: may be ignored / overwritten by account settings.

method.name: Send(string, string, string, string, string, params Attachment[])
method.summary: Sends the mail synchronously with a title and optionally with display name and replyer.
method.param: message in plain text or html.

[can be null] sender's name, for example: "Microsoft Corp.".
Note: may be ignored / overwritten by account settings.

[can be null] reply email address, for example: "no@reply.com".
Note: must be like an email address.
